suite.name: 01 Home Login

test.name: 1001 Home page should load

kw.name: Open Browser To Home Page
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout that is used by various keywords.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.arg: Welcome to the customer relationship manager site!
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.
Ouvre le navigateur et navigue à la page d'accueil.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Close Browser Session
Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
Ferme la session du navigateur.

test.doc: Vérifie que la page d'accueil se charge et que ses éléments existent.

test.name: 1002 Login should succeed with valid credentials

kw.name: Open Browser To Home Page
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout that is used by various keywords.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.arg: Welcome to the customer relationship manager site!
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.
Ouvre le navigateur et navigue à la page d'accueil.

kw.name: Log In With Valid Credentials
Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.
Effectue la connexion avec des identifiants valides.

kw.name: Location Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL contains ``expected``.

kw.name: Close Browser Session
Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
Ferme la session du navigateur.

test.doc: Vérifie que la connexion réussit avec des identifiants valides.

test.name: 1003 Login should fail with missing credentials

test.doc: Vérifie que la connexion échoue si les identifiants sont manquants.

suite.doc: Tests d'automatisation pour la page d'accueil et la fonctionnalité de connexion (Scénarios 1001 à 1003).
